    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Vindkraft</string>
            <string language="en">Wind energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windenergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie éolienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia do vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia del vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía del viento</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvordan kan man produsere elektrisk energi ved hjelp av vind? Utforsk hvordan dette gjøres ved hjelp av vindmøller.</string>
            <string language="en">How is electrical energy produced using wind? Explore how it is done using windmills?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">vindmølle</string>
            <string language="en">windmills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">vindkraft</string>
            <string language="en">wind energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie ist die elektrische produzierte Energie 
verwendender Wind? Erforschen Sie, wie sie mit Windmühlen getan
wird?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment l'énergie électrique produite du vent 
est-elle d'utilisation ? Explorez comment elle est faite à 
l'aide des moulins à vent ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como é a energia elétrica produzida vento se 
usando? Explore como é feita usando moinhos de vento?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come è l'energia elettrica prodotta vento 
usando? Esplori come è fatta per mezzo dei mulini a vento?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς είναι η ηλεκτρική ενέργεια παραχθείσα 
χρησιμοποιώντας αέρας; Εξερευνήστε πώς γίνεται 
χρησιμοποιώντας τους ανεμόμυλους;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo es la energía eléctrica producida viento 
que usa? ¿Explore cómo se hace usando los molinos de viento?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windmühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moulins à vent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie éolienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moinhos de vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia do vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mulini a vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia del vento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανεμόμυλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια αέρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">molinos de viento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía del viento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
